edge: Kareena Kapoor portrays the character of Pooja Khanna in this movie.
Tusshar Kapoor plays the role of Karan Malhotra in this movie.
Mallika Sherawat acts as Seema in this movie.
Kader Khan essays the character of Mahendra Malhotra in this film.
Vijayendra Ghatge portrays the character of Pooja's father in this movie.
Himani Shivpuri depicts the character of Mrs. Malhotra in this film.
Alok Nath portrays the character of Mr. Khanna in this movie.
